channel.title: Xbox
channel.description: I have an Xbox with a broken hard drive, and I need to replace it, but I don't know if I just put it in there or if I need to install any special software on it for it to work?

item.title: Xbox
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:

item.title: Xbox
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

If you’re Xbox360’s On and off button is going Red all the time then usually it means you’re
Xbox is stuffed or you just need to reset it.

Read full topic

item.title: Xbox
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

back up the harddrive and then just buy another 2.5" SATA hard drive (not one of the xbox specific ones they are a rip off for a small amount of data storage.) However i’ve been told it voids your warranty if you replace the xbox hard drive so think carefully about what you are going to do with it

Read full topic
